Subject: Yalla Improv! Enhancing Coaching Skills, Kayan Wellness Festival Discount, Level Shoes Staff Sale, Jacquemus End of Season Sale & Check out our Sustainability Courses on Chalhoub University

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/Z2uy6lKOZ02rZvEAlsHf0g/544502/4C7433AD8F37E0FA9D7A0F760761734E/top-banner-eng.png>

YALLA IMPROV! ENHANCING COACHING SKILLS

The Coaching Community embraced creativity and spontaneity in an engaging “Yalla Improv” session led by Lea Maalouf. Through improvisational acting, participants discovered innovative approaches to building trust, enhancing collaboration, and ‘thinking on their feet’ key skills for impactful coaching. Find out more <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fonechalhoub.connexionsnow.com%252fpost%252fODE0%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWRQvoWVMivT8TtQRD0KHmt0J2tHR959u%252bDD0vD%252f1aQSNDICfSHZXkvw0i2XY5XvNCWQJGg37RmnmmxzVktrPu%252fnAHxUkFGOVkFojYdegBmorVMcWNoIfpKVXhtHXxePg6j%252fp6obvK84vbk9jJjCXY2xzjMTqMsIZh7VbRlF1owFVlFlhJTbnJoptO7Coj50ajZb3TGQkjrDb3g%252bHFzlaQ64YBJ9LZbDuT%252fKh94Hv1G10&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C3f152f10905849713bde08dd2f11f4a7%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638718476334956769%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=lSGgb1M%2FDHM4QltqQvrpURxYasB4OweZzJp%2FexORIIg%3D&reserved=0>

EXCLUSIVE WELLBEING DISCOUNT | KAYAN WELLNESS FESTIVAL

Take a step towards your wellbeing at the Kayan Wellness Festival, the region’s largest wellness event, happening from Jan 31st to Feb 2nd. From cacao ceremonies and sound healing to HIIT classes and workshops, there’s something for everyone. Enjoy an exclusive 10% discount with the code CHL10. 
Get your tickets here <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252feur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com%252f%253furl%253dhttps%25253A%25252F%25252Fabu-dhabi.platinumlist.net%25252Fevent-tickets%25252F95899%25252Fkayan-wellness-festival-2025-in-abu-dhabi%2526data%253d05%25257C02%25257CAmal.Bedhyefi%252540chalhoub.com%25257C0d0939c5c00a4c372e6908dd1f267b77%25257C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%25257C0%25257C0%25257C638700972345511173%25257CUnknown%25257CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%25253D%25253D%25257C0%25257C%25257C%25257C%2526sdata%253djzopibg8Xjc0NW9%25252Bx55T%25252B%25252F93zfjSkNlx%25252BfTUeVa8Dqk%25253D%2526reserved%253d0%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWRQvoWVMivT8TtQRD0KHmt0J2tHR959u%252bDD0vD%252f1aQSNDICfSHZXkvw0i2XY5XvNCWQJGg37RmnmmxzVktrPu%252fnAHxUkFGOVkFojYdegBmorVMcWNoIfpKVXhtHXxePg6j%252fp6obvK84vbk9jJjCXY2xzjMTqMsIZh7VbRlF1owFVlFlhJTbnJoptO7Coj50ajZb3TGQkjrDb3g%252bHFzlaQ64YBJ9LZbDuT%252fKh94Hv1G10&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C3f152f10905849713bde08dd2f11f4a7%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638718476334977399%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=e4Hyu05SFAy1ubIJNqidGD2xp%2B1mqSl0j02aYzmm1Co%3D&reserved=0>

Celebrate the season with exclusive flat 50% off on all sale items, available both online and in-store for Chalhoub Group team members.

To redeem in-store, present your Employee ID at checkout.
